00019 #include <qtable.h>
00020 #include <qlineedit.h>
00021 #include <qwidget.h>
00022 
00023 #include "journalEditCurrency.h"
00024 #include "journalEditCurrencyValidator.h"
00025 #include "journalData.h"
00026 
00027 JournalEditCurrency::JournalEditCurrency(QTable *table, const Q_INT64 amount)
00028     : QTableItem(table, QTableItem::OnTyping)
00029 {
00030     journalData = JournalData::instance();
00031 
00032     if(amount)
00033         setText(journalData->convertCurrency(amount));
00034 }
00035 
00036 QWidget* JournalEditCurrency::createEditor() const
00037 {
00038     QLineEdit *lineEdit = new QLineEdit(text(), table()->viewport());
00039     lineEdit->setValidator(new JournalEditCurrencyValidator(lineEdit,
00040                             "journalEditCurrency::lineEditValidator"));
00041     lineEdit->selectAll();
00042     return lineEdit;
00043 }
00044 
00045 Q_INT64 JournalEditCurrency::value() const
00046 {
00047     QString newText = text();
00048     newText = newText.remove('.');
00049     Q_INT64 amount = newText.toULongLong();
00050     return amount;
00051 }
